ABOUT TROIKA SCHOOL

On Monday, 26th September 2005, Troika School was born, a nursery an primary school.

Location was, and has been, the fast growing educational hub of the Lekki Peninsula, Igbo Efon precisely. Our has has been daring to be pace-setters in terms of the content and delivery of educational services to discerning parents in Lekki. Focused on our mission “ To impact Lekki, Nigeria and the world – one child at a time – through the implementation of TOTAL QUALITY MULTILINGUAL (ENGLISH / FRENCH/CHINESE) EDUCATION that positively transforms the child mentally, emotionally and physically, whilst maximizing his/her potentials.
Contact us
Designed by CREAZIONI   |    Troika School, Lekki.  Copyright : 2021   |   All Rights Reserved
